title: Elephorm - Learn the basic Cinema 4D R15 - French
description: Learn how to model and animate a robot in 3D with Cinema 4DR15 software! You follow step by step the work of a professional 3D artist, Alexandre Desmassias to progress. Finally the author details the render settings and explains how it finalizes its illustration in Photoshop.
